skins.shipDescription: Kent-class heavy cruiser - Kent, Hull Number 54!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm both one of the first County-class cruisers and the first ship of the Kent-class. Pretty impressive, right? Stuff like Armour can be made up with good motivation and a fighting spirit! Right?
skins.acquisition: Hey Commander! I'm Kent! How do you do? Good? Bad? Doesn't matter. Things will be better now that I'm here!
skins.login: Yo, Commander, let's go do something together!
skins.details: Errr, Graciously overlook my poor armour and firepower, please!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I forgot that Tigre isn't around...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, do you wanna race against me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I think I've seen ships from the Far East before... They look really strong!
